content.text: Hey, I'm (name). It's nice to meet you!
Hey, I'm (name). It's nice to meet you too!
What are some of your hobbies?
I love to garden, cook, and make art.
Those are great hobbies! I love to cook too. What kind of art do you make?
I make a lot of different types of art, but my favorite is painting.
That's awesome! I love to paint too. I'm more of a hobbyist, but I've been painting for a few years now.
That's great! I've been painting for about 10 years now. Do you have any favorite artists?
I love Van Gogh and Monet. What about you?
I love Van Gogh too! I also love Frida Kahlo and Georgia O'Keeffe.
Those are great artists! I've seen a lot of their work in person.
Me too! I've been lucky enough to visit a lot of museums.
That's awesome! I love visiting museums too.
Yeah, they are. I love seeing all the different types of art.
Me too! I can always find something new to appreciate.
